inclusion.criterion: total mastectomy or lumpectomy for primary breast cancer
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: arthralgia and associated joint symptoms while on anastrozole
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: WBC ≥ 3.0 x 10^9/L, granulocytes ≥ 1.5 X 10^9/L and platelets ≥ 100 x 10^9/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST/SGOT or ALT/SGPT ≤ 3 times ULN Serum creatinine ≤ 2 times ULN
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous or concomitant other malignancy within previous 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: other non-malignant systemic diseases preventing prolonged follow-up
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of coronary artery disease or no history of previous coronary heart disease but at least two other coronary heart disease risk factors
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients on hormone replacement therapy within 4 weeks before trial treatment was initiated
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients on breast cancer chemoprevention with anti-oestrogens if less than 18 months between stopping and diagnosis of breast cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known hypersensitivity to any component of testosterone
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
